document_data.name: She-Spider Cult
document_data.mainbody: The '''She-Spider Cult''' was a [[drow]] religious organization based in [[Thay]] that tried to combine the worship of the evil goddesses [[Lolth]] and [[Shar]], but ended up opposed by both deities.
document_data.Activities: After losing the favor and divine support of both Lolth and Shar, the She-Spider Cult changed direction, becoming instead a secret criminal organization. They ran drug-running and slave trade operations in southern Thay, [[Mulhorand]], and [[Unther]]. The Cult continued performing ritual sacrificies, but without divine support these were mostly for show, intended to thrill their followers and slay their enemies.
document_data.Members: *[[Malabeth Tr'rudena]], a [[cleric|priestess]] who was suspected of being a spy for [[Lolth]].{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1993|485|Malabeth Tr'rudena}}
